verbs.description: [ARG0: super typhoon mangkhut] [V: kills] [ARG1: at least 50] [ARGM-TMP: before landing in china super typhoon mangkhut] is one of the biggest storms to hit china since 1949 millions of people have been relocated thousands of hectares of farmland had been damaged and so far 50 people in the philippines and 4 people in china have been reported dead hong kong macau macau hong kong macau yunnan xinhua china meteorological administration mangkhut fung china taiwan guangdong chongqing guangxi philippines official china central television guizhou hong kong shenzhen

super typhoon mangkhut kills at least 50 before [V: landing] [ARGM-LOC: in china] [ARGM-PRD: super typhoon mangkhut] is one of the biggest storms to hit china since 1949 millions of people have been relocated thousands of hectares of farmland had been damaged and so far 50 people in the philippines and 4 people in china have been reported dead hong kong macau macau hong kong macau yunnan xinhua china meteorological administration mangkhut fung china taiwan guangdong chongqing guangxi philippines official china central television guizhou hong kong shenzhen
